Yoruba b·ªç w·ªçn ni ika to ba t·ªç si imu laa fi n remu.

Gbajugbaja osere, Yomi Fabiyi ti kesi ak·∫πgb·∫π r·∫π, Toyin Abraham wi pe ki w·ªçn pari ija to wa laarin aw·ªçn mejeeji.
Yomi Fabiyi t·ªçr·ªç idariji l·ªçw·ªç Toyin Abraham lori ·∫πr·ªç ikansira·∫πni Instagram r·∫π, ki Toyin si f·ªçw·ªç w·ªçnu ninu ·ªçdun tuntun.
Fabiyi fi kun un wi pe gbogbo ·∫π·π£·∫π ti Toyin ·π£·∫π oun ni oun ti dariji, ki Toyin naa ·π£e bakan naa, ki ohun gbogbo si pada si ipo laarin w·ªçn.
Everyday that we wake up is a fresh start. If we are revisiting the past because of regrets, then we need to be clear that we can't go back and undo what we have done.  Toyin, you know I have always prepared my mind that my friend(s) at any rate and time will offend me and I do forgive in advance. In the case that spilted us, it got the best part of me, I would have judged any other differently too until I was in the shoes.  Many questions may be unanswered, that is fine by me and I know you well, you would have wish some scenarios never happened. Switch to that emotional, kind, remorseful, soft and God fearing Toyin that attracted me to you. Reflect, be sober and get teary if necessary while making genuine assesment. NOBODY CAN EVER KNOW THE FULL GIST LIKE YOU AND I anyway. I wish to state unequivocally that I FORGIVE YOU from the depth of my heart. Also, I reacted in a way that is inappropiate afterwards, I HUMBLY APOLOGIZE and to anyone who feel offended, ejo e ma binu. May God forgive us all. TRUE FRIENDSHIP IS THE BIGGEST CULT and to me, there is nothing like HALF LOYALTY, sad, ours turns out the way it did. We are humans and not alliens afterall. Lessons learnt. I will continue to value and hold you in high esteem. You have many goods with me I can tap strength from. I love to travel light in this new year. I wish you and your loved ones a WONDERFUL and PROSPEROUS 2019. More success and more wins. And to this strange lady EUNICE OMOSHALEWA ENIOLA LAWAL (that I never met until the case) but was used to accuse me of sexual harrasment, I forgive you and your sponsors too. I also forgive you INSTABLOG9JA. Listen up, I never reported or have your account ever flagged at any time in my life, it was all lies against me by whoever, so you can hurt me with your platform and followers. Ile aiye ogun ni but we will survive cos inu mimo ja j'ogun (plain heart fights harder than jazz). To my fans, THANK YOU ALL for you understanding.  Love for all, hatred for none. W·ªçn bi Shehu Usman Aliyu Shagari ni ·ªçj·ªç k·∫π·∫πd·ªçgb·ªçn, o·π£u Keji, ·ªçdun 1925, ni abule Shagari to wa ni ipinl·∫π Sokoto.
O wa lati ile olorogun, oun si ni ·ªçm·ªç k·∫πfa ti wsn bi ninu ·∫πbi r·∫π.
Shagari b·∫πr·∫π iwe kika nileewe ti w·ªçn ti n k·ªç Keu, ko to o di pe o l·ªç si ileewe alak·ªçb·∫πr·∫π Yabo Elementary School l·ªçdun 1931 si 1935.
Bakan naa lo l·ªç si ileewe Kaduna College laarin ·ªçdun 1941 si 1944.
O gboye im·ªç ijinl·∫π g·∫πg·∫π bi oluk·ªç ni nileewe giga Teachers Training College to wa ni Zaria, nipinl·∫π Kaduna.
O si si·π£·∫π oluk·ªç lati ·ªçdun 1953 di 1958 ni ·∫πk√πn Sokoto.
Oun ni aar·∫π alagbada ak·ªçk·ªç ati aar·∫π kan ·π£o·π£o to j·∫π lasiko eto o·π£elu awaarawa keji (1979-1983).
Bakan naa lo j·∫π minisita ati ·ªçm·ªç igbim·ªç olu·π£akoso ninu ij·ªçba apap·ªç l·∫π·∫πmeje laarin ·ªçdun 1958 si 1975.
Shehu Shagari darap·ªç m·ªç o·π£elu l·ªçdun 1951 lasiko to fi di ak·ªçwe ·∫πgb·∫π Northern People's Congress ni Sokoto. O si wa ni ipo naa di ·ªçdun 1956.
L·ªçdun 1954, w·ªçn dibo yan an fun igba ak·ªçk·ªç si ipo ·ªçm·ªç ile a·π£ofin apap·ªç lati ·π£oju ·∫πk√πn idibo Iw·ªç Oorun Sokoto. O di ak·ªçwe fun Olotu Ij·ªçba Nigeria nigba naa, Sir Abubakar Tafawa Balewa l·ªçdun 1958, ko to o di pe o di minisita fun kata-kara ati ·ªçr·ªç aw·ªçn ilee·π£·∫π l·ªçdun 1959.
L·ªçdun 1959 si 1960, Shagari j·∫π Minisita fun idagbasoke eto ·ªçr·ªç aje. Ipo naa lo wa di ·ªçdun 1960 ti w·ªçn tun s·ªç ·ªç di minisita fun ·ªçr·ªç aw·ªçn o·π£i·π£·∫π f·∫πhinti di ·ªçdun 1962.

L·∫πyin ogun ab·∫πle to waye, ·ªågagun to wa ni i·π£akoso nigba naa, Yakubu Gowon, fi Shagari j·∫π K·ªçmisana ij·ªçba apap·ªç fun idagbasoke eto ·ªçr·ªç aje, imupadab·ªçsipo ati atunto laarin ·ªçdun 1970 si 1971.
·∫∏w·∫π, o j·∫π minisita fun eto ·∫πnawo l·ªçdun 1971 si 1975. Lasiko yii bakan naa lo j·∫π gomina fun Banki Agbaye ati ·ªçm·ªç igbim·ªç aj·ªç to ayanilowo lagbaye, International Monetary Fund (IMF).
L·ªçdun 1978, Shehu Shagari j·∫π ·ªçkan lara aw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªç ·∫πgb·∫π to b·∫πr·∫π ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu National People's Party. ·∫∏gb·∫π naa si yan an l·ªçdun 1979 lati dije fun ipo aar·∫π oril·∫πede Naijiria.
Ninu eto idibo naa, o jawe olubori, o si di aar·∫π Naijiria.
Shagari gbe apoti ibo saa ·ªçl·ªçdun m·∫πrin fun igba keji l·ªçdun 1983, o si tun w·ªçle.
Aw·ªçn ·∫πsun bi iwa ij·∫πkuj·∫π, to fi m·ªç ·π£i·π£e mago-mago lasiko eto idibo ·ªçdun 1983 ni w·ªçn fi kan i·π£akoso Sahgari. Eyi ati bi eto ·∫πnawo ij·ªçba ·π£e d·∫πnu k·ªçl·∫π, ti √¨·π£·∫π si p·ªç laarin ilu mu ki aw·ªçn araalu b·∫πr·∫π si ni korira i·π£ej·ªçba r·∫π.
·ªågagun Muhammadu Buhari ja ij·ªçba gba m·ªç l·ªçw·ªç l·ªçj·ªç k·ªçkanlel·ªçgb·ªçn, o·π£u Kejila, ·ªçdun 1983.
Lasiko ti oril·∫πede Naijiria ri ·ªçp·ªçl·ªçp·ªç owo latara epo b·∫πtiro, Shagari fi ipese ile gibgbe, kik·ªç ilees·∫π ati idagbasoke eto irinna ati i·π£·∫π agb·∫π ·π£e afojusun ij·ªçba r·∫π.
L·ªçdun 1980, ij·ªçba r·∫π pari kik·ªç ibudo if·ªçpo Kaduna refinery, o si b·∫πr·∫π i·π£·∫π l·ªçdun naa. Bakan naa lo √†ri kik·ªç aw·ªçn ibi kan ni ilee·π£·∫π ti w·ªçn ti n wa irin tutu ni Ajaokuta.
Oun kan naa lo pari ilee·π£·∫π to n ·π£e irin, Delta Steel Complex l·ªçdun 1982. O si tun da ilee's·∫π ti w·ªçn ti n jo irin m·ªç irin, Aluminium Smelter Company of Nigeria, sil·∫π nilu Ikot Abasi, to wa nipinl·∫π Akwa Ibom ode oni.
Iyawo m·∫πta ni Oloogbe Shehu Shagari f·∫π: Amina, Aishatu ati Hadiza Shagari. O bi ·ªçp·ªçl·ªçp·ªç ·ªçm·ªç.
·ªåkan lara aw·ªçn iyawo r·∫π, Aishatu Shagari dagbere faye nileewosan kan nilu London l·ªçj·ªç l·∫πrinlelogun, o·π£u K·∫πj·ªç, ·ªçdun 2001 l·∫πyin aisan ra np·∫π.

Eto ilana ·∫πk·ªç ti ·ªçdun 1999 ni ki ij·ªçba pese eto ·∫πk·ªç ·ªçf·∫π fun aw·ªçn ak·∫π·∫πk·ªç ni ile iwe alak·ªçb·∫πr·∫π. Aw·ªçn ak·∫π·∫πk·ªç gb·ªçd·ªç l·ªç si ile iwe alak·ªçb·∫πr·∫π ati ·ªçdun m·∫πta to saaju ni girama, am·ªç ti ij·ªçba ipinl·∫π ko nii san owo yii.

·π¢ugb·ªçn ipinl·∫π Zamfara lo buruju nipa gbi gba aw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªçbinrin si ile-iwe. Ni gbogbo eto ile iwe ni iye aw·ªçn ·ªçkunrin ti p·ªç ju aw·ªçn obinrin l·ªç ni il·ªçpo meji.
Iru eto ·∫πk·ªç ti aw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªç yii n gba ni ile iwe naa ·π£e pataki. G·∫πg·∫π bi ak·ªçsil·∫π Aj·ªç Nigerian Education Data Survey (NEDS) ni ·ªçdun 2015, 44% aw·ªçn ak·∫π·∫πk·ªç to wa ni ile-iwe alak·ªçb·∫πr·∫π ti ij·ªçba lo m·ªç iwee ka, nigbati 74% aw·ªçn ak·∫π·∫πk·ªç to wa ni ile iwe aladani lo m·ªç iwe ka. Am·ªç, ni ile iwe ti ·ªçl·ªçdun m·∫πta ak·ªçk·ªç ni girama, aw·ªçn to m·ªç iwee ka ati kik·ªç j·∫π 91% ati 96%.
Aar·∫π Buhari ti seleri lati fi 15% owo isuna ·ªçdun si eto ·∫πko, am·ªç ak·ªçsil·∫π isej·ªçba r·∫π fihan wi pe o nilo lati se ju b·∫π·∫π l·ªç lati le mu ileri naa ·π£·∫π.
Ni ·ªçdun 2016, ij·ªçba Buhari fi 8% owo isuna si eto ·∫πk·ªç ati ni ·ªçdun 2017 ni o wal·∫π si 7.4%. Ni ·ªçdun 2018,  7% ni w·ªçn ya s·ªçt·ªç lara owo isuna ·ªçdun to j·∫π bii 650bn naira ($1.8bn, ¬£1.4bn).
Bi Aar·∫π Buhari ba f·∫π mu ileri r·∫π s·∫π, o gb·ªçd·ªç fi kun owo isuna eto ·∫πk·ªç si bii 1.3tn naira, tabi ki o din owo isuna ·∫πka miiran ku.
Ni ·ªçdun 2018, ij·ªçba apap·ªç fi owo to to 650bn naira si ·∫πka eto ·∫πko, ti ida meji l·ªçna m·∫πta (407.8bn naira) si y·∫π ko j·∫π fun sisan owo o·π£u aw·ªçn osis·∫π.
·∫∏w·∫π, iye owo ti w·ªçn fi n san owo osu yii f·∫πr·∫π d·ªçgba p·∫πlu owo isuna fun eto abo ati wi pe owo perete  (12.2bn naira) ninu r·∫π ni w·ªçn fi n san owo o·π£u aw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªçogun il·∫π naa.

Ti w·ªçn ba pa a p·ªç m·ªç owo o·π£u aw·ªçn ti i·π£·∫π w·ªçn j·ªç m·ªç ti ·ªçl·ªçgun (164bn naira), apap·ªç owo naa ko tii to iye owo ti ij·ªçba n lo fi san owo o·π£u aw·ªçn o·π£i·π£·∫π ni ·∫πka eto ·∫πko, ti ko si to 1tn naira ti Atiku Abubakar s·ªç wi pe w·ªçn n na.

·ªålawuyi s·ªç eyi lasiko to n fesi si abajade idibo ti Aj·ªç INEC ti kede r·∫π g·∫πg·∫πbi ·∫πni to jawe olubori ninu atundi ibo naa.
O ni, bi oun se moke ninu atundi ibo naa j·∫π aseyori to n b·ªç l·ªçp·ªç faw·ªçn eeyan ipinl·∫π naa.
·∫∏gb·∫π oselu PDP ti ni, oun ko gba esi idibo ti Aj·ªç Eleto idibo loril·∫πede Naijiria, INEC gbe jade, l·∫πyin ti w·ªçn kede Raheem Olawuyi ti ·∫πgb·∫π oselu APC, g·∫πg·∫πbi ·∫πni to jawe olubori ninu atundi ibo si ile asojusofin l·∫πkun idibo Ekiti/Irepodun/Isin/Oke-Ero ni ipinl·∫π Kwara.
Alaga ·∫πgb·∫π oselu PDP ni ipinl·∫π Kwara, Kola Shittu, lasiko to n ba BBC Yoruba s·ªçr·ªç ni, ·∫πgb·∫π PDP ti setan lati k·ªç esi idibo naa, am·ªç aw·ªçn si n duro ki INEC fi ak·ªç·ªçl·∫π akoj·ªçp·ªç esi ibo naa rans·∫π si aw·ªçn.

""Ko si ·ªçm·ªç ·∫πgb·∫π APC kankan ti ·ªçl·ªçpa gbe lasiko ibo naa, am·ªç se ni w·ªçn n dunkoko m·ªç aw·ªçn asaaaju ·∫πgb·∫π PDP lasaiko atundi ibo naa.""

·∫∏gb·∫π Oselu Labour Party ni ibo aad·ªçj·ªç( 150), ti ·∫πgbe oselu Peoples Party of Nigeria (PPN) ni ibo m·∫πrindinl·ªçg·ªçrin(76) ti UPN si ni ibo mejilelogoji(42).

Kansil·ªç ni ij·ªçba ibil·∫π ·ªåd·∫πda lo fi b·∫πr·∫π irinajo o·π£elu r·∫π. W·ªçn yan an g·∫πg·∫π bii amugbal·∫πgb·∫π fun ij·ªçba ipinl·∫π Ogun lasiko i·π£ej·ªçba ·ªåtunba Gbenga Daniel.
L·∫πyin to ti j·∫π olori ·∫πka ·ªçd·ªç fun ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu PDP ni ·∫πkun idibo apap·ªç aringbungbun ipinl·∫π Ogun, lo wa l·ªç du ipo alaga ij·ªçba ibil·∫π Lagelu ni ipinl·∫π ·ªåy·ªç ni ·ªçdun 2007.
Ni ·ªçdun 2011, ni w·ªçn fi ibo yan an si ile a·π£ofin ipinl·∫π ·ªåy·ªç lab·∫π a·π£ia ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu Accord, ki o to w·ªçle g·∫πg·∫π bii ·ªçm·ªç ile igbim·ªç a·π£oju-·π£ofin to n soju ·∫πkun idibo Lagelu/Akinyele, lab·∫π a·π£ia ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu APC.
Ni ·ªçdun 2018 lo darap·ªç m·ªç ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu ADP lati du ipo S·∫πnet·ªç ki o to fidir·∫πmi.

Igbakeji aar·∫π oril·∫πede Naijiria, ·ªåj·ªçgb·ªçn yemi Osinbajo ni oun k·ªç loun wa nidi amojuto akan·π£e eto Ruga Settlement bi aw·ªçn kan ·π£e n gbe iroyin r·∫π ka.

Eekan kan ninu ·∫πgb·∫π oselu APC, Bola Ahmed Tinubu ti woye pe jinnijinni ti n ba aw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªç ·∫πgb·∫π oselu PDP, ti w·ªçn si ti n sa kijokijo kiri.
Tinubu ni niw·ªçn igba ti ara aw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªç ·∫πgb·∫π oselu alatako naa ko bal·∫π m·ªç, o y·∫π kaw·ªçn ·ªçd·ªç ninu ·∫πgb·∫π APC b·∫πr·∫π si ni se koriya lati ri daju pe w·ªçn t·∫πnp·∫πl·∫π m·ªç eto koriya ti w·ªçn n se faw·ªçn ·ªçd·ªç lati dibo.

Tinubu tun raw·ªç ·∫πb·∫π saw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªç ·∫πgb·∫π APC lati ko aw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªç ·∫πgb·∫π PDPto n ya wa sinu ·∫πgb·∫π oselu ·ªçhun m·ªçra nitori gbogbo w·ªçn ni w·ªçn ti di ojulowo ·ªçm·ªç ·∫πgb·∫π.
A·π£iwaju ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu APC, B·ªçla Tinubu ti paroko ikil·ªç ran·π£·∫π saw·ªçn ·ªçd·ªç nipinl·∫π Eko pe ki w·ªçn yago fun jiji apoti idibo gbe lasiko idibo aar·∫π ati ile a·π£ofin apap·ªç to n b·ªç l·ªçj·ªç abam·∫πta.
Otinubu ni "" ·∫∏ ti gb·ªç ohun ti Buhari s·ªç nipa jiji apoti ibo gbe. Mi o ran ·∫πnik·∫πni lati l·ªç ji apoti ibo gbe o. Kaadi idibo mi lemi fi n ja nitemi o.bi ·∫π ba ji apoti ibo gbe tabi da wahala sil·∫π t·ªçw·ªç ba ba yin, mi o l·ªçw·ªç ninu iy·∫πn o.""
O ni aw·ªçn ti t·∫πw·ªç gba isunsiwaju idibo naa lat·ªçw·ªç ajs INEC nitori ·ªçd·ªç aj·ªç INEC ni ofin fi si lori iruf·∫π i·π£·∫πl·∫π ba waye.
""Iro opolopo awon oniroyin po. Eleyi ti mi o so l'ose to koja, won ni mo so, a so niyen"". Olori egbe APC Bola Tinubu ro awon omo egbe pe ki won jade dibo fun Aare Muhammadu Buhari ni idibo ojo Satide.
Ninu oro re, o so pe PDP ni awon ba ja. Pe awon o ba ajo INEC ja nitori pe ofin wa leyin won ati pe o sese ki won ni ipenija ni won fi sun idibo naa siwaju. O gba l'adura pe ajo INEC yoo so layo lori idibo yii ti APC yoo si jawe olubori. O benu ate lu egbe PDP wipe won lo d'ogbon lo fina bo'le l'Abia, won pale oko mo ati bee bee lo. O fi orin ayajo Sunny Ade kan ba won wi pelu ijo lese.O gba awon omo egbe n'iyanju pe ki won ma ba enikankan ja. O ni ki won gba awon omo PDP ti won darapo mo egbe APC wole."

Oludije fun ipo aar·∫π ninu ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu African Action Congress, (AAC) ninu eto idibo aar·∫π Naijiria l'·ªçdun 2019, ·ªåm·ªçy·∫πle ·π¢owor·∫π s·ªç pe ·∫πr√π ni ko j·∫π ki ·∫πgb·∫π to n ·π£eto if·ªçr·ªçwer·ªç lasiko eto idibo ni Naijria, Election Debate Group (NEDG) pe oun si ibi if·ªçr·ªçwer·ªç laarin aw·ªçn oludije fun ipo aar·∫π.

Aw·ªçn fidio naa ti Aisha Buhari fi sita fa awuyewuye lori ·∫πr·ªç ayelujara, ti ·ªçp·ªç eniyan si b·∫πr·∫π si ni foju wo o g·∫πg·∫π bi alatako gboogi fun Aar·∫π.

Ninu at·∫πjade kan to fi sita, Aisha s·ªç pe eto idibo naa kun fun fifi ·∫πt·ªç ·∫πni dun ni, p·∫πlu alaye pe ·∫πgb·∫π y·ªç oruk·ªç aw·ªçn oludije kan to ti ra f·ªç·ªçmu lati dije kuro l'·ªçj·ªç idibo.
It is disheartening to note that some aspirants used their hard earned money to purchase nomination forms, got screened, cleared and campaigned vigorously yet found their names omitted on Election Day, these forms were bought at exorbitant prices.  Many others contested and yet had their result delayed. Fully knowing that AUTOMATIC tickets have been given to other people. All Progressives Congress being a party whose cardinal principle is change and headed by a comrade/ activist whose main concern is for the common man, yet, such impunity could take place under its watch. Given this development one will not hesitate than DISSOCIATE from such unfairness, be neutral and speak for the voiceless. It is important for the populace to rise against impunity and for voters to demand from aspirants to be committed to the provision of basic amenities such as: 1. Potable drinking water 2. Basic health care ( Primary Health Care centers) 3. Education within conducive & appropriate learning environments. Let us vote wisely !!!! LONG LIVE FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA!!!!!!

End of Instagram post  by aishambuhari

VERY URGENT!!! It turns out that logo that will show for MDP on the Election day ballot papers is wrong. We have tried every possible option to see if the ballot papers can be reprinted, but that is unfortunately not possible. So we move on.  No sense crying over spilt milk. The good news is WE ARE ON THE BALLOT. You will see ""Modern Democratic party"" on the ballot with this new logo... so PLEASE help us repost the logo everywhere. We are also reprinting as much campaign material as we can. We will not be deterred by any obstacle. We will not be discouraged. We will focus on the finish line and forge ahead. No weakness. No regrets.  #MDP #STRONGERTOGETHER #BANKONBANKY  PS: My last name was also misspelled, but that's a non issue because you won't see candidate names on election day... just party names, acronyms, and logos. Please remember the Modern Democratic Party. God bless you.

Bakan naa ni ile ·∫πj·ªç s·ªç pe, ko tun da owo to ji ko ·ªçhun pada si apo ij·ªçba. O·π£u Karun, ·ªçdun 2007 ni aj·ªç EFCC fi ·∫πsun kan an.

Ahmed Rufai Abubakar lo jab·ªç ohun ti oju w·ªçn ri ni South Africa fun Aar·∫π Buhari ti aar·∫π si ni:

Let me also say that we have made arrangements for the immediate voluntary evacuation of all Nigerians in South Africa who are willing to return home. I have directed the relevant agencies to ensure this is done speedily and efficiently.

Kini ij·ªçba Naijiria ni l·ªçkan fun aw·ªçn ti w·ªçn n ko b·ªç pada sile -Abik·∫π Dabiri?

K√≤ t√≠√¨ s√≠ √¨r√†nl·ªçw·ªç ow√≥ f'√†w·ªçn ·ªçm·ªç N√†√¨j√≠r√≠√† t√≠ ≈Ñ b·ªç l√°ti South Africa -Abike Dabiri.

Sugb·ªçn loot·ªç ni alaj·ªç Somolu wa,  Alphaeus Taiwo Olunaike ni oruk·ªç r·∫π, to si gbe aarin wa nil·∫π Yoruba, o bim·ªç, o laya, o k·ªçle, to si tun se aw·ªçn ohun rere miran ti eeyan n gbe ile aye se.

Ta ni F·∫πla ·ªçm·ªç Durotoye?
Fun ·∫πni ti o ba m·ªç itan o·π£elu oril·∫π-ede Naijiria fun igba di·∫π s·∫πyin,, oruk·ªç F·∫πla Durotoye ko lee j·∫πy·ªç g·∫πg·∫π bii ara aw·ªçn olo·π£elu atigbadegba loril·∫π-ede Naijiria.
·ªåj·ªç kejila, o·π£u karun, ·ªçdun 1971 ni w·ªçn bi F·∫πla Durotoye g·∫πg·∫π bii Adetokunb·ªç Oluwaf·∫π·ªçlami Durotoye.
·ªåj·ªçgb·ªçn ninu im·ªç ijinl·∫π ni baba ati iya r·∫π, Layiw·ªçla ati Adeline Durotoye ni fasiti Ibadan ki w·ªçn to l·ªç si fasiti ilu If·∫π eyi ti o ti di Obafemi Awolowo University, OAU bayii.
Ohun to y·∫π ki o m·ªç nipa F·∫πla Durotoye:

Ni fasiti Obafemi Awolowo yii ni Fela Durotoye ti k·∫πk·ªç gboye im·ªç ·∫πr·ªç K·ªçmputa p·∫πlu eto ·ªçr·ªç aje ki o to tun kawe gba im·ªç kun im·ªç p·∫πlu ·∫πk·ªç im·ªç ijinl·∫π keji, MBA ni fasiti OAU yii kan naa ki o to tun wa im·ªç l·ªç si gbajugbaja fasiti ni, Havard University ni oril·∫π-ede Am·∫πrika.
Ogunna gbongbo onim·ªç nipa i·π£una ni F·∫πla Durotoye.
O ti ·π£i·π£·∫π p·∫πlu ·ªçp·ªç ilee·π£·∫π ja-n-kan-ja-n-kan kaakiri agbaye bii Ventures and Trust Limited, Phillips consulting limited ki o to l·ªç da ilee·π£·∫π V.I.P Consulting limited sil·∫π ni ·ªçdun 2000.

Baba Suwe:
Gbajugbaja ati ilum·ªç·ªçka apanil·∫πÃÅr√¨n √≠n ni Babatunde Omidina, ti ·ªçp·ªç eeyan m·ªç si 'baba suwe' lagbo ad·∫πrinpo·π£onu ninu sinima ni il·∫π Yoruba. O si j·∫π oruk·ªç kan to l·ªç fun ·ªçp·ªç ·ªçdun.
Ni ipil·∫π sinima ni il·∫π Yoruba, gbogbo aw·ªçn onworan ni igba naa ni w·ªçn maa n foju wa arakunrin r·ªçgb·ªçd·ªç aboju dudu h·ªçh·ªçh·ªç p·∫πlu ·π£okoto ti o tobi juu l·ªç, ti o fi okun ·∫πran nla so p·∫πlu ·∫πwu agbotutu l·ªçrun.
Ko si ile ti ko f·∫πr·∫π m·ªç Baba Suwe ni igba naa.
·ªådun 1958 ni w·ªçn bi Babatunde Omidina, ti ·ªçp·ªç m·ªç si Baba Suwe ni  ilu Eko.
Ni ·ªçdun 1972 ni Baba Suwe di osere tiata sugb·ªçn sinima ·ªåbalende lo gbe oruk·ªç r·∫π jade. Bakan naa ni aw·ªçn sinima bii Iru ·∫πsin, Baba jayejaye ati ·ªçp·ªç sinima miran tun gbe oruk·ªç r·∫π jade.

Aluw·∫π, ·ªçm·ªç iya Alaro:

""Baba Mero, ·ªåga mi lo fun ni oruk·ªç Aluw·∫π ti mo n j·∫π ninu ere, ·π£ugb·ªçn agba olorin, Sunny Ade lo fi Papiluw·∫π kun un.""

Op·∫πb·∫π:

·∫∏y·∫π meji kii j·∫π a·π£a ni ·ªçr·ªç ·ªåp·∫πb·∫π ninu sinima nitori oun naa ni o·π£ere apanil·∫πrin ti o maa n gbe iwa akanda ·∫πda ti ·ªçw·ªç n dun w·ªç, ninu sinima Yoruba.
·ªåm·ªç ipinl·∫π Ogun ni, ere ·ªçl·ªçs·ªç·ªçs·∫π ori mohunmaworan ti w·ªçn n pe ni '·∫∏rin keeke' ni o gbe ·ªåp·∫πb·∫π saye ni ·ªçdun 1987 lori ikanni m·ªçhunmaworan Channel 8.
·ªåp·ªç ere ti baba Suwe ba ti kopa, naa ni ·ªåp·ªçb·∫π maa saba n kopa ninu r·∫π.
·∫∏l·∫π·π£·ªç ·∫πnu n ja waya:

D·∫πj·ªç Tunfulu:
·ªåkan lara aw·ªçn apanil·∫πrin to gbajugbaja ni ipele sinima agbelewo ede Yoruba ni Kunle Makinde Tokunb·ªç ti ·ªçp·ªç m·ªç si D·∫πj·ªç Tunfulu.

""·ªådun 1987 ni mo ti b·∫πr·∫π si nii ·π£e ere itage. Mo si maa nkopa ninu 'Tiata ·ªåm·ªçde' lori ikanni Channel 7 mohumaworan apap·ªç il·∫π Naijiria, NTA .""

Idaj·ªç ile ·∫πj·ªç giga naa tun ti mu ifas·∫πyin ba ·∫πgb·∫π oselu APC ni ipinl·∫π Kwara ti o ti m·∫πh·∫π, l·∫πyin ti Aar·∫π Ile Igbim·ªç Asofin,Bukola Saraki ti kuro ni ·∫πgb·∫π oselu APC naa ti o si fa ipinya laarin aw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªç ·∫πgbe·∫π ni ipinl·∫π Kwara.

Onim·ªç kan nipa isegun ·∫πranko ati aw·ªçn ohun ·ªçsin abiy·∫π ti ni, ko si oogun fun aisan lukuluku (bird flu), l·∫πyin ti aisan lukuluku pa adiye ·∫πgb·∫πrin o din ·ªçg·ªçrun ni ipinl·∫π Plateau.
Dokita John Jesuwale lasiko to n ba BBC Yoruba s·ªçr·ªç ni, w·ªçn ko ti i gba ab·∫πr·∫π oogun lukuluku (vaccine) fun aisan lukuluku laaye loril·∫πede Naijiria, ati wi pe, ·∫πnik·∫πni to ba ko w·ªçle, yoo finmu kata ofin.
Dokita Jesuwale ni, af·∫πf·∫π ni aisan yii ma n ba rin, ati pe, ti w·ªçn ba si da adi·∫π to ni aisan naa pap·ªç m·ªç adi·∫π ti ko ba ni, ewu nla nb·∫π fun w·ªçn.
Aisan lukuluku ti aw·ªçn oloyinbo n pe ni Bird flu, ti w·ªçn n p·∫π ni avian influenza, ma n pa adiy·∫π, awon eranko miran ati eniyan pelu. H5N1 ni aisan lukuluku to w·ªçp·ªç ju.

Kini ·ªçna abay·ªç si aisan lukuluku:

Aar·∫π Muhammadu Buhari, to s·∫πs·∫π jawe olubori fun saa keji ti l·ªç gba iwe ·∫πri 'Mo yege' l·ªçd·ªç aj·ªç eleto idibo nilu Abuja.
Aar·∫π Buhari ati igbakeji r·∫π, Y·∫πmi ·ªåsinbajo ni w·ªçn dij·ªç l·ªç gba iwe ·∫πri naa.
Nigba to n fun w·ªçn ni iwe ·∫πri naa ni gb·ªçngan nla ICC to wa nilu Abuja, Igbakeji aar·∫π ati iyawo r·∫π ni w·ªçn k·ªçks l·ªç gba iwe ·∫πri naa, ko to kan aar·∫π funra r·∫π.
Ninu ·ªçr·ªç r·∫π nibi ay·∫πy·∫π gbigba iwe ·∫πri Mo yege ·ªçhun, eyi ti ·ªçp·ªç eeyan peju si, aar·∫π Muhammadu Buhari ni oun dup·∫π l·ªçw·ªç ·ªål·ªçrun pe eto idibo naa t·ªçri si rere.
O ni o daju pe eto idibo naa l·ªç lai si k·ªçnu n k·ªçh·ªç ninu, taa ba wo iwoye aw·ªçn eeyan to wa t·ªçpinpin ibo naa lati il·∫π okeere.
Buhari wa kesi aw·ªçn alatil·∫πyin r·∫π lati mase y·ªç aw·ªçn igun alatako, am·ªç ki gbogbo w·ªçn dij·ªç gbaruku ti oun lati mu ki Naijiria t·∫πsiwaju.
O ni oun yoo gbe isej·ªçba ti yoo l·ªçw·ªç gbogbo eeyan ninu, ti yoo si ba ala gbogbo wa mu fun oril·∫πede Naijiria to dara, ti aabo to peye wa nib·∫π.

·ªåp·ªç ·ªçm·ªç Naijiria ni w·ªçn ji ni ·ªçj·ªç ·∫∏ti si p·ªçp·ªç-·π£in·π£in ·∫πdinwo g·ªçb·ªçi lori aw·ªçn ·ªçja kaakiri aw·ªçn gbajugbaja ile itaja loril·∫π-ede Naijiria.
Koda ·ªçr·ªç naa kan gbogbo agbaye p·∫πlu eleyi ti w·ªçn n pe ni ""Black Friday""
·ªåp·ªç ni o si maa n lo anfani eto ayaj·ªç ·∫πdinwo 'Black Friday"" naa lati fi ra aw·ªçn ·ªçja opin ·ªçdun sile.
·∫∏dinwo ·ªçja yii a maa fa w·ªçlu-k·ªçlu ni ·ªçp·ªç aw·ªçn ile itaja nitori ·ªçp·ªç ero ti o f·∫π ra ·ªçja lowo p·ªç·ªçku.
Bi o til·∫π j·∫π pe pup·ªç aw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªç oril·∫π-ede yii ni w·ªçn kopa, ·ªçp·ªç ni ko lee s·ªç ni pato, bi eto Black Friday yii ·π£e b·∫πr·∫π.

Ohun ti itan yii s·ªç ni pe aw·ªçn ·ªçl·ªçpaa ataw·ªçn awak·ªç ni w·ªçn maa n lo o Black Friday lati fi ·π£e apejuwesunk·∫πr·∫π-fak·∫πr·∫π ·ªçk·ªç ti o maa n waye lasiko ti aw·ªçn to wa raja ba f·ªçn si oju popo ni ·ªçj·ªç ·∫πti, (Friday) ·π£aaju if·∫πs·∫πw·ªçns·∫π b·ªç·ªçlu laaarin ik·ªç ·ªçm·ªçogun oriil·∫π ati ·ªçm·ªçogun oju omi eleyii ti o maa n waye ni ·ªçj·ªç abam·∫πta nigba naa.

·ªåkan lara aw·ªçn eeyan to l·ªç ra ·ªçja nib·∫π, Ade·ªçla ·ªåd·ªçle to ba BBC News Yoruba s·ªçr·ªç ·π£alaye pe igba keji niyi ti oun n kopa ninu ayaj·ªç ·∫πdinwo ·ªçja Black Friday nib·∫π.
""Ko si ·∫πni ti ko f·∫πran ·∫πdinwo nitori ko si owo nilu, ·π£ugb·ªçn nigba ti w·ªçn kede r·∫π ni mo fi wa. R

Re-run election
(Atundi idibo)
:
Idibo yi ma n waye ti idibo alak·ªçk·ªç ba ni magomago ninu, tabi ti aw·ªçn eleto idibo ko ba t·∫πl·∫π alakal·∫π eto idibo.


Recall
(Yiy·ªç oloselu)
:
Yiy·ªç oloselu j·∫π eto ti aw·ªçn oludibo le gbe lati y·ªç asoju ni Ile Igbimo Asofin Ipinl·∫π ati ti ij·ªçba apap·ªç kuro ni ipo.


Rejected ballot
(Aw·ªçn ibo ti w·ªçn k·ªç)
:
Aw·ªçn ibo ti w·ªçn k·ªç ni aw·ªçn ibo ti ko ·π£afhan¬†eni ti oludibo naa dibo fun daadaa, nitori w·ªçn ko t·∫π ika si iwaju ·∫πni ti w·ªçn f·∫π dibo fun bi o ti y·∫π, nitori naa, aw·ªçn eleto idibo a da ibo naa nu nitori it·∫πka naa ko si loju ibi to y·∫π ko wa.


Return
(Dida oludije pada)
:
Eyi ma n waye ti oludije to ti wa ni ipo t·∫πl·∫π ba jawe olubori, ti Aj·ªç INEC wa fun ni iwe lati da a pada si ipo.


Returning Officer (RO)
(O·π£i·π£·∫π Ajo INEC)
:
Eyi ni osis·∫π Ajo INEC ti yoo s·ªç esi idibo l·∫πyin ti w·ªçn ba ti ka a.


Run-off election
(Atundi idibo)
:
Idibo eyi maa n waye ti ko ba si ·∫πni to jawe olubori l·ªçna to lamilaaka si ipo gomina tabi aar·∫π oril·∫π-ede. Eyi le waye ti ·∫πni to ba jawe olubori ko ba bori law·ªçn agbegbe to se pataki lati jawe olubori.

S

SIEC
(Aj·ªç eleto idibo ni ipinl·∫π.)
:
Aj·ªç eleto idibo ni ipinl·∫π ni o wa ni isakoso idibo ni aw·ªçn ij·ªçba ibil·∫π. Ipinl·∫π k·ªç·ªçkan lo ni aj·ªç yii lati le sakoso eto ibo.

T

(Iwe idibo aw·ªçn akanda ·∫πda)
:
Iwe idibo yii wa fun aw·ªçn ti o ni aisan oju ti ko si le riran daradara, ki w·ªçn baa le dibo w·ªçn ni ik·ªçk·ªç lai si iranw·ªç ·∫πnik·∫πni (i.e ni idak·ªçnk·ªç ati lai si iranw·ªç ·∫πnik·∫πni)


Tendered ballot paper
(Idibo to ni bosej·∫π)
:
Eyi ni iwe idibo fun oludibo, l·∫πyin ti ·∫πlomiran ti lo oruk·ªç r·∫π lati fi dibo. Nitori naa ni w·ªçn yoo se fun¬†un ni iwe idibo miran, amo ti o ba ti dibo tan, asoju Aj·ªç INEC to wa nib·∫π ko ni fi sinu apoti idibo, yoo fi si ibomiran.

:

·∫∏gb·∫π Shiite ti kede pe oun ti w·ªçgile aw·ªçn iw·ªçde gbogbo loju popo ilu Abuja, eyi to ni se p·∫πlu itusil·∫π olori w·ªçn, Ibrahim El-ZakZaky.

""Ti if·∫πhonu han kankan ba si waye nibikibi loril·∫πede yii, a j·∫π pe at·∫πjade yii ko tii t·∫π aw·ªçn to wa nib·∫π l·ªçw·ªç ni, tabi pe w·ªçn si ·ªçr·ªç yii gb·ªç abi aw·ªçn agbofinro lo wa nidi is·∫πl·∫π naa, g·∫πg·∫π bi wsn ti n se lati lat·∫πyinwa lati ta ·∫πr·∫π si as·ªç ala wa, l·ªçna ati mu kaw·ªçn eeyan maa fi oju arufin wo wa, dipo oju aw·ªçn eeyan ti w·ªçn n fi iya j·∫π lati ·ªçdun 2015.""

Igbeyawo ati Idile Wole Soyinka
Iyawo aar·ªç Wole Soyinka, Barbara Dixon ti w·ªçn si ni ·ªçm·ªçÃÄkunrin kan, Olaokun Soyinka.

Gbogbo ·ªçm·ªç Wole Soyinka j·∫π marun un, obinrin m·∫πta (Peyibomi Soyinka Airewele, Moremi Soyinka Onijala, Iyatade Apampa) ati ·ªçkunrin meji (Olaokun Soyinka, Makin Soyinka).

Ak·ªçwe apap·ªç fun ·∫πgb·∫π apap·ªç aw·ªçn eeyan apa oke ·ªçya, Anthony Sani ti kede idi ti ·∫πgb·∫π naa se k·∫πyin si oludije fun ipo aar·∫π lab·∫π asia ·∫πgb·∫π oselu PDP, Atiku Abubakar.

Sani ni, ko si ·∫πgb·∫πk·∫πgb·∫π tabi ·∫πnik·∫πni to wa eekanna m·ªç ·∫πgb·∫π Ar·∫πwa l·ªçrun lati se atil·∫πyin fun Buhari am·ªç aw·ªçn asey·ªçri r·∫π, afojusun r·∫π ninu ileri ipolongo ibo r·∫π ati agbara ti ·∫πgb·∫π oselu k·ªç·ªçkan ni, ni aw·ªçn se agbey·∫πwo r·∫π.
Ak·ªçwe ·∫πgb·∫π Ar·∫πwa ni, ·∫πgb·∫π naa k·∫πyin si oludije fun ipo aar·∫π lab·∫π asia ·∫πgb·∫π oselu PDP, Atiku Abubakar, nitori bo se n polongo kiri pe oun yoo se atunto il·∫π yii, ti oun yoo si tun ta aw·ªçn dukia aj·ªçni wa kan bii ilees·∫π NNPC.
O fikun pe, gbogbo aw·ªçn dukia ti w·ªçn ti ta nil·∫π Naijiria t·∫πl·∫π ko mu eso rere kan wa, bakan naa si ni eto atunto to n polongo ko nitum·ªç m·ªç ni asiko yii, tori pe, atunto ti ba aw·ªçn ·∫πka isej·ªçba wa t·∫πl·∫π bii ·∫πka eto iselu, ·ªçr·ªç aje ati ·∫πkun idibo k·ªç·ªçkan.

·∫∏gb·∫π oselu alatako nil·∫π Naijiria, PDP, ti n naka aleebu si ij·ªçba apap·ªç oril·∫πede yii lab·∫π aar·∫π Muhammadu Buhari pe , o ti gb·∫πs·∫π le apo asunw·ªçn owo oludije fun ipo igbakeji aar·∫π ninu ·∫πgb·∫π oselu naa, Peter Obi.

O·π£u Karun, ·ªçdun 1919 ni w·ªçn k·ªçk·ªç fi eto idibo lel·∫π ni Naijiria, lasiko ti ofin asiko naa fi ·∫πt·ªç fun di·∫π lara aw·ªçn ·ªçkunrin ilu lati dibo yan a·π£oju m·∫πta sinu Igbim·ªç Olu·π£akoso ilu Eko.
·ªåj·ªç k·ªçkandinl·ªçgb·ªçn, o·π£u K·∫πta , ·ªçdun 1920 si ni idibo ak·ªçk·ªç waye.
L'·ªçdun 1922, iwe ofin tuntun (Clifford Constitution) jade, eyi to ·π£e idasil·∫π idibo yan eniyan m·∫πrin sile a·π£ofin;m·∫πta fun Eko, ·∫πy·ªçkan fun ilu Calabar.
Aw·ªçn to si ti pe ·∫πni ·ªçdun m·ªçkanlelogun tabi ju b·∫π ·∫π l·ªç, to j·∫π ·∫πr√∫ il·∫π G·∫π·∫πsi tabi j·∫π ·ªçm·ªç oril·∫πede Naijiria to ti gbe ni agbegbe kan fun o·π£u mejila ·π£aaju eto idibo nikan lo ni anfaani lati dibo.
Eniyan bi ·∫πgb·∫πrun m·∫πrin ninu ·∫πgb·∫πrun m·ªçkandinl·ªçg·ªçrun to n gbe nilu lo f'oruk·ªç sil·∫π lati dibo nilu Eko, nigba ti ·ªçtalenirinwo din meje eniyan si f'oruk·ªç sil·∫π ni ilu Calabar.
·ªådun maarun si ni aw·ªçn to ba jawe olubori fi wa nipo.
Eto idibo sile a·π£ofin waye ni Naijiria l·ªçj·ªç kejila, o·π£u Kejila, ·ªçdun 1959. ·∫∏gb·∫π o·π£elu Northern People's Congress lo bori ju p·∫πlu bi ijoko m·∫πrinlelaadoje ninu ·ªç·ªçdurun le mejila nile a·π£ofin ·π£e ja m·ªç ·ªç l·ªçw·ªç.
·ªåj·ªç k·ªçkanla, o·π£u K·∫πj·ªç, ·ªçdun 1979 ni eto idibo aar·∫π k·ªçk·ªç waye ni Naijiria. Shehu Shagari, ti ·∫πgb·∫π National Party of Nigeria lo jawe olubori. Awuyewuye waye lori esi ibo naa lori, ti ·ªçr·ªç si de ile ·∫πj·ªç to ga ju ni Naijiria. Shagari ni ·∫πj·ªç gb√® e.

Eto idibo aar·∫π tun waye l·ªçj·ªç kejila, o·π£u K·∫πfa, ·ªçdun 1993, fun igba ak·ªçk·ªç l·∫πyin ti aw·ªçn ologun dit·∫π gbaj·ªçba l'·ªçdun 1983.
Esi ibo naa fihan pe Oloogbe Moshood Kashimawo Abi·ªçla, ti ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu Social Democratic Party, SDP, lo bori. O fi ·∫πyin Bashir Tofa, ti ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu National Republican Convention, janl·∫π.
·π¢ugb·ªçn, olori oril·∫πede Naijiria nigba naa lab·∫π i·π£ej·ªçba aw·ªçn ologun, Ibrahim Babangida fagile esi ibo naa. Igbes·∫π r·∫π naa y·ªçri si rogbodiyan, eyi to tun mu ki idit·∫π gbaj·ªçba mi i ti Oloogbe ·ªågagun Sani Abacha le waju tun waye l·ªçdun naa.
Eto idibo aar·∫π tun waye l·ªçj·ªç k·∫πtadinl·ªçgb·ªçn, o·π£u Keji, ·ªçdun 1999. Eyi ni idibo ak·ªçk·ªç to waye lati ·ªçdun 1993 ti aw·ªçn ologun ti dit·∫π gbaj·ªçba.
Olu·π£·∫πgun ·ªåbasanj·ªç ti ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu People's Democratic Party, PDP, lo bori.
·π¢aaju asiko yii ni eto idibo sile a·π£ofin waye l·ªçj·ªç k·∫π·∫πd·ªçgb·ªçn, o·π£u K·∫πrin, ·ªçdun 1998. Eyi naa j·∫π igba ak·ªçk·ªç ti idibo sile a·π£ofin waye lati ·ªçdun 1992.
Idit·∫π gbaj·ªçba ·ªçdun1993 lo si fa a. Gbogbo ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu to kopa ninu idibo naa lo ni iba·π£ep·ªç p·∫πlu i·π£ej·ªçba ologun, ti w·ªçn si f'ofin de aw·ªçn ·∫πgb·∫π alatako.

·ªås·∫π to t·∫πle ni idibo sile a·π£ofin apap·ªç ati ti aar·∫π waye l'·ªçs·∫π to t·∫πle. Umaru Yar'Adua ti ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu PDP lo gbegba oroke. W·ªçn si bura fun l'·ªçj·ªç k·∫π·∫πd·ªçgb·ªçn, o·π£u Karun, ·ªçdun 2019.

Eto idibo gbogboogbo mi i tun waye ni ·ªçj·ªç k·∫πrindinlogun, o·π£u K·∫πrin, ·ªçdun 2011. Awuyewuye ti k·ªçk·ªç waye lori boya ara Ariwa tabi ara Gusu ni ko j·∫π aar·∫π l·∫πyin iku Aar·∫π Umaru Yar'Adua, to j·∫π ara Ariwa.

·ªåba Jamiu Adedam·ªçla Badmus, JP, Ayel·∫πs·ªç III, Olu Aso ti Iberekodo naa ko gb·∫πyin ninu aw·ªçn ·ªçba ati ijoye to darap·ªç m·ªç ·ªçdun naa.

Arulogun fi kun ·ªçr·ªç r·∫π wipe akan·π£e eto naa duro g·∫πg·∫π bi ipil·∫π fun ilepa lati ·π£e akoj·ªçp·ªç aw·ªçn ib·∫πji l'agbaye, p·∫πlu afojusun ak·ªçsil·∫π ninu iwe to n ·π£e onka aw·ªçn i·π£·∫πl·∫π ayanil·∫πnu l'agbaye, 'Guiness Book of Record'.
O t·∫πsiwaju wipe aj·ªçdun ibeji t·ªçdun yii j·∫π ·ªçkan lara aw·ªçn alakal·∫π eto fun ayaj·ªç ·ªçj·ªç irinajo igbaf·∫π ni agbaye fun ·ªçdun 2018, lati ·ªçw·ªç ij·ªçba ipinl·∫π ·ªåy·ªç, p·∫πlu alaye wipe gbogbo ·ªçna ni ij·ªçba ipinl·∫π naa n gbaa lati rii daju wi pe idagbasoke de ba eto ·ªçr·ªç aje, a·π£a ati ·∫πka irinajo igbaf·∫π.
""·ªådun aw·ªçn ibeji yoo fun wa ni anfani lati ·π£e afihan ilu Igbo-·ªåra g·∫πg·∫π bi ilu ti o tay·ªç ninu onka ibeji ati ·ªçm·ªç to ju m·∫πji l·ªç lagbaye.
A f·∫π rii daju wipe ipej·ªçp·ªç naa n waye ni ·ªçd·ªç·ªçdun, ki a le fi aye gba aw·ªçn eto l'ori·π£iri·π£i ti yoo s·ªç Igbo-·ªåra di ibudo igbaf·∫π fun aw·ªçn arinrinajo lati il·∫π okeere.""
Arulogun ni l·∫πyin aj·ªçdun t·ªçdun yii, ij·ªçba ipinl·∫π ·ªåy·ªç yoo gbiyanju lati ·π£e ·ªçdun ibeji ni ·∫πkun iw·ªç-oorun guusu ki o to di wipe yoo kari oril·∫πede Naijiria ati gbogbo agbaye.
Lara aw·ªçn eto to waye nibi ay·∫πy·∫π naa ni orin idaraya, idije l·ªçl·ªçkanoj·ªçkan laarin aw·ªçn ibeji, yiyanfanda bi ologun, ifami·∫πy·∫πdanil·ªçla ati b·∫π·∫πb·∫π·∫π l·ªç.
Aw·ªçn ak·ªç·π£·∫πm·ªç·π£·∫π nipa onka aw·ªçn eeyan ilu fidir·∫π mul·∫π wi pe ilu Igbo ·ªåra lo ni onka aw·ªçn ibeji to p·ªç jul·ªç l'agbaye, p·∫πlu alaye wipe okere tan, ibeji mejidinl·ªçg·ªçj·ªç lo ma a n wa ninu aw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªç ·∫πgb·∫πrun kan ti w·ªçn ba bi nilu Igbo-·ªåra.

·ªåp·ªçl·ªçp·ªç aw·ªçn eeyan gbagb·ªç wipe Amala ati ·ªçbe Ilasa ti aw·ªçn eeyan ilu naa kundun lo n ·π£okunfa ibeji ati ·ªçm·ªç to ju meji l·ªç, b·∫π·∫π sini aw·ªçn ·∫πlomii ri i·π£·∫πl·∫π naa g·∫πg·∫π bi ohun ti o ti ·ªçw·ªç ·ªål·ªçrun wa."

Ninu o·π£elu ati i·π£ej·ªçba Naijiria, ·ªçp·ªçl·ªçp·ªç ni aw·ªçn eekan to kara j·ªç sib·∫π to j·∫π wi pe bi w·ªçn ba wi, kii p·∫π tan kal·∫π g·∫πg·∫π bi iroyin, pup·ªç ninu w·ªçn si wa lati ipinl·∫π Ogun.
Bi a ba tun wa fi ti ·∫πya tabi ede wo o, aw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªç Yoruba w·ªçnyii kii ·π£e ·∫πni aa f·ªçw·ªç r·ªç s·∫πyin ni aw·ªçn ibi giga giga loril·∫πede Naijiria.
Ki Naijiria to gba ominira ati l·∫πyin ominira ni a ti ri aw·ªçn w·ªçnyii to n le waju ninu i·π£akoso ati idari loniruuru ·ªçna. ·∫∏w·∫π, aw·ªçn to j·∫π ·ªçm·ªç bibi ipinl·∫π Ogun ni a o gbey·∫πwo.
·ªåj·ªç karun un o·π£u k·∫πta ·ªçdun 1937 ni a bi Oloye Olu·π£·∫πgun Mathew Okiki·ªçla Ar·∫πmu ·ªåbasanj·ªç (GCFR, PhD) ni ilu Abeokuta, ipinl·∫π Ogun. ·ªågagun t·∫πl·∫π ri lo j·∫π ni ile i·π£·∫π ogun Naijiria ko to di olori oril·∫πede lab·∫π ij·ªçba ologun laarin ·ªçdun 1976 si 1979 l·∫πyin naa lo tun di olori oril·∫πede lab·∫π ij·ªçba atiwa n tiwa laarin ·ªçdun 1999 si 2007 lab·∫π asia ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu Peoples Democratic Party.
·ªåbasanj·ªç rinrin ajo pup·ªç l·ªç soke okun to si ni iba·π£ep·ªç to dan m·ªçran p·∫πlu aw·ªçn aj·ªç il·∫π okere ti inu aw·ªçn naa si dun lati ni ba ·ªçm·ªç il·∫π adulaw·ªç bayii d·ªçr·∫π eyi ti ko k·ªç esi ·ªçr·ªç ·∫πnik·∫πni si igbes·∫π r·∫π yala nile tabi l·∫πyin odi ti ·ªåbasanj·ªç a si maa bori iru ·∫πnu at·∫π w·ªçnyii l·ªçp·ªç igba.
·ªåj·ªç k·ªçkandil·ªçgb·ªçn tii ·π£e ·ªçj·ªç ti Olu·π£·∫πgun ·ªåbasanj·ªç di aar·∫π alagbada ni w·ªçn lo g·∫πg·∫π bi ayaj·ªç ·ªçj·ªç ij·ªçba tiwa n tiwa bayii loril·∫πede Naijiria.
2003 ni wn tun dibo yan ·ªåbasanj·ªç eyi to si j·∫π idibo p·∫πlu ·ªçp·ªçl·ªçp·ªç iwa ipa ati ipenija. Nigba naa l·ªçhun ·ªågagun Muhammadu Buhari ni oludije ·∫πgb·∫π alatako ·π£ugb·ªçn ·ªåbasanjo jawe olubori.
Nigba ti ipinnu r·∫π lati lo saa k·∫πta lori alefa g·∫πg·∫π bi aar·∫π ko r·ªçw·ªç mu ni o gbe eku ida kal·∫π l·∫πyin idibodun 2007.
Oloye ·ªåbaf·∫πmi Jeremiah Oyeniyi Awol·ªçw·ªç (GCFR) j·∫π ·ªçm·ªç bibi ilu Ikenne ipinl·∫π Ogun l·ªçj·ªç k·∫πfa o·π£u k·∫πta ·ªçdun 1909 o si di oloogbe l·ªçj·ªç k·∫πsan o·π£u karun ·ªçdun 1987. O j·∫π agba oril·∫πede Naijiria ti gbogbo eniyan b·ªçw·ªç fun nitori i·π£·∫π takuntakun r·∫π ninu igbes·∫π lati gba ominira fun Naijiria - lasiko ij·ªçba amunisin to di m·ªç lasiko ogun. Olo·π£elu nla ni p·∫πlu. Oun ni aw·ªçn m·ªç si oludasil·∫π ak·ªçk·ªç ti Western Union o si tun j·∫π K·ªçmisana fun eto isuna. Bakan naa, o ti j·∫π igbakeji aar·∫π fun igbim·ªç ala·π£·∫π oril·∫πede yii.
Awol·ªçw·ªç lo ·π£e i·π£·∫π ·ªçp·ªçl·ªçp·ªç i·π£ofin eyi to ti s·ªç Najiria di ilu olokiki bayii. W·ªçn maa n ri Awol·ªçw·ªç g·∫πg·∫π bii a·π£aju eto o·π£elu ij·ªçba awa ara wa.  O ·π£e eto ·∫πk ·ªçf·∫π fun gbogbo gbo ati ilera ·ªçf·∫π faw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªçde l·∫πkun Iw·ªç Oorun. Oun lo k·ªçk·ªç da ile i·π£·∫π mohunmaworan ak·ªçk·ªç sil·∫π nil·∫π Afirika l·ªçdun 1959.
Oloye Funmilay·ªç Anikulapo-Kuti j·∫π ·ªçm·ªç bibi ilu Abeokuta l·ªçj·ªç k·∫π·∫πdgb·ªçn o·π£u k·∫πwa ·ªçdun 1900 titi to fi papoda ni ·ªçj·ªç k·∫πtala o·π£u k·∫πrin ·ªçdun 1978. Oluk ni o j·∫π, olupolongo o·π£elu, ajaf·∫πt obinrin  ati onigbagb·ªç ninu a·π£a. O j·∫π kan lara awn a·π£aju oril·∫πede Naijiria nigba aye r·∫π. Oun naa si ni obinrin ak·ªçk·ªç to k·ªçk·ªç wa ·ªçk·ªç. Ilakaka r·∫π ninu o·π£elu lo mu ki wn maa sapejuwe r·∫π g·∫πg·∫π bi ''Erelu ·∫πt·ªç aw·ªçn obinrin loril·∫πede Naijiria''. Funmi Kuti ni iya to bi gbajugbaja olorin ajaf·∫πt·ªç ·ªçm·ªçniyan, Fela Anikulapo Kuti.
Ilu Odogbolu ni ipinl·∫π Ogun ni a ti bi Donaldson ·ªåladip·ªç Diya ni ·ªçj k·∫πta o·π£u k·∫πrin ·ªçdun 1944. Diya j·∫π onim·ªç nipa ofin tro si j·∫π adaj·ªç ile ·∫πj·ªç to ga ju l·ªç loril·∫πede Naijiria o si tun k·∫πk·ªç·ªç nipa i·π£·∫π ogun.
W·ªçn yan an g·∫πg·∫π bii gomina ij·ªçba ologun ti ipinl·∫π Ogun laarin 1984 si ·ªçdun 1985. O ti j·∫π ·ªçgagun lori ori·π£iri·π£i ik·ªç ogun loril·∫πede Naijiria. W·ªçn yan an ni ·ªåga agba aw·ªçn ·ªçm ogun alaabo l·ªçdun 1993.

·ªåj·ªçgb·ªçn Y·∫πmi ·ªå·π£inbajo j·∫π ·ªçm·ªç bib ilu Ikenne ni ipinl·∫π Ogun. W·ªçn bi i ni ·ªçj·ªç k·∫πj·ªç o·π£u k·∫πta ·ªçdun 1957. O di igbakeji aar·∫π oril·∫πede Naijiria l·ªçj·ªç kkandinl·ªçgb·ªçn o·π£u karun ·ªçdun 2015 oun si tun ni igbakeji fun aar·∫π Buhari ninu idije fun ipo aar·∫π Naijiria l·ªçdun 2019. lati ·ªçdun ti Y·∫πmi ·ªå·π£inbajo ti dara p·ªç m·ªç o·π£elu Naijiria, awn eto ati igbes·∫π r·∫π lab·∫π asia ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu APC ti n fa oju ·ªçp·ªç m·ªçra yala lati to si i l·∫πyin tabi lodi si oun ati isej·ªçba aar·∫π to n ·π£e igbakeji r·∫π."

Kanu ni ij·ªçba apap·ªç nigba t√≥ n lo ile ·∫πj·ªç giga to wa ni Abuja lati gb·∫π·π£·∫π le a·π£·∫π ti o fun oun ni beeli t·∫πl·∫π, ·π£ugb·ªçn ti w·ªçn ti yii pada ba yii lati fi panp·∫π ·ªçba mu oun, nipa lilo aw·ªçn ·ªçl·ªçpaa agbaye, eyi to jasi pabo.

Yoruba ni odo kii gun, ko ma ni orirun. B·∫π·∫π naa ni is·∫π ere itage sise j·∫π, tori Hubert Adedeji Ogunde ni ·ªçp·ªç eeyan gba pe o b·∫πr·∫π ere tiata lede Yoruba, eyi to wa di it·∫πw·ªçgba lode oni.
Oniruuru ere itage to n k·ªçni l·ªçgb·ªçn, pani l·∫πrin, to si tun n k·ªç ni l·∫πk·ªç ni Ogunde ti ·π£e jade nigba aye r·∫π, b·∫π·∫π si ni aw·ªçn awo orin r·∫π lo maa n gbe jade lati fi kil·ªç fun iwa ibaj·∫π lawuj·ªç wa, paapa laye aw·ªçn oyinbo amunisin.
Bi Hubert Ogunde til·∫π ·π£il·∫π bora, sib·∫π ko y·∫π ka gbagbe aw·ªçn i·π£·∫π takun-takun to ti gbe ·π£e lati ·π£eranw·ªç fun a·π£a, i·π£e ati ede Yoruba ko ma baa parun, idi si ree taa fi gb·ªçd·ªç m·ªç ohun kan tabi meji nipa iruf·∫π eeyan ti Ogunde j·∫π.
Yoruba ni ati oore, ati ika, ·ªçkan kii gbe, nitori naa lo se y·∫π ka se aye re.
Bi o til·∫π j·∫π pe Hubert Adedeji Ogunde ti waye, o ti se iw·ªçn to lee se, ti ipa to fi lel·∫π ninu idagbasoke igbe aye ·ªçm·ªçniyan ko si lee par·∫π, o y·∫π ki awa ta j·∫π ab·∫πmi loke eep·∫π loni fi eyi se awok·ªçse rere, ka si se aye re.
Bakan naa lo y·∫π ka maa bi ara wa leere pe ti mo ba l·ªç tan, ki ni aye yoo maa wi nipa temi?"

Alaga aj·ªç INEC, ·ªåj·ªçgb·ªçn Mahmood Yakubu ni ofin idibo loril·∫πede Naijiria ti la ijiya to y·∫π fun ·∫πnik·∫πni to ba tapa si ofin idibo nitori naa aj·ªç INEC ko lee faye gba ofin tabi a·π£·∫π miran to ba yat·ªç si ilakal·∫π ofin yii.

Alaga aj·ªç INEC naa ni aj·ªç ·ªçhun ko naani ·ªçr·ªç yoowu  ti aar·∫π Buhari lee s·ªç si nitori a·π£·∫π ati ilana aj·ªç naa wa l·ªçw·ªç aj·ªç naa g·∫πg·∫π bii aj·ªç to da duro ni ominira.
Lori iroyin kan taw·ªçn iwe iroyin ab·∫πle kan gbe ni ·ªçj·ªç i·π£·∫πgun pe aw·ªçn agbofinro DSS ti gbe ·ªçkan lara aw·ªçn k·ªçmi·π£·ªçna r·∫π, ·ªåj·ªçgb·ªçn Yakubu ni pe ko si oot·ªç ninu iroyin naa.

OjuÃÅ-oÃÄpoÃÅ ti iÃÄta niÃÅ aÃÄw·ªçn w·ªçÃÄnyiÃÅ, yoo si ·π£i niÃÅ ojuÃÅ-iweÃÅ miÃÅraÃÄn
Aare orile-ede Naijiria Muhammedu Buhari ti dupe lowo awon omo ile igbimo asofin Naijiria lori titete pari iforowanilenuwo fun awon minisita ti won fi sowo si won
Awon omo ile igbimo asofin agba lo ojo ise marun gbako lati ri si iforowanilenuwo awon minisita, eyi ti won ti bere lati ojo ojoru, ojo kerinlelogun osu keje si ojo isegun ogbon ojo osu keje lati pari ioforwanilenuwo fun awon minisita metalelogoji ti won ti fi oruko won ranse si ile asofin lojo ketaleogun osu keje.
Aare Buhari ni oun ni igbagbo lati le fun won ni ile ise ti won a ti sise laipe.
'' Modupe lowo gbogbo awon omo ile igbimo asofin agba ti won fi ara ji lati sise lori awon minisita to won ko si fi fale rara''
''Awon omo Naijiria n fe ri abajade ise ti ijoba n se, pelu awon eniyan to wa ninu minisita.
Mo nigbagbo pe ise ijoba yoo mu ere dani.
N o yan ise won fun won ni kete ti a ba ti se ifilole awon alase leyin ibura wole won gege bi aare se so ninu atejade kan lale ojo Isegun.
Opo awon omo Naijiria lo n fokan si i pe aare yoo se ifilole awon omo igbimo re lojo Isegun lasiko ipade awon alase ijoba.
Ninu awon minisita metalelogoji ti aare yan, obinrin meje pere lo wa ninu won.
Awon mejila ni yoo je agba omo igbimo nitori pe igbakeji won ree sugbon ko si eni omo odun marundinlogoji kankan ninu won.
Hadi Sirika, Chris Ngege, Rotimi Amaechi, Babatunde Fashola, Ogbonnaye Onu, Lai Mohammed Adamu Adamu, Geofrey Onyema, Zinab Ahmed ati Osagie Ehimere ni awon minisita to ba aare sise ni saa to koja"

·ªåp·ªçl·ªçp·ªç i·π£·∫πl·∫π lo maa n bi ija ati aigb·ªçra-·∫πni ye laarin ololuf·∫π meji.

Omowe Jane Monckton Smith to j·∫π onim·ªç ijinl·∫π nipa iwa ·∫πda lo ·π£·∫π·π£·∫π fi abajade iwadii to ·π£e sita lori iwa ipa laarin ololuf·∫π.

Tabi ko kuku pa eeyan ni igb·∫πsan lori aj·ªç·π£ep·ªç aw·ªçn mejeeji.
7) Iru ·∫πni yii a wa b·∫πr·∫π si ni ronu ·ªçna ti yoo gba pa ololuf·∫π r·∫π to ba k·ªç lati moju kuro.

""Aw·ªçn iyawo ati aw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªç mi ni ara, oludam·ªçran ati ·ªçr·∫π ti mo ni."" ·ªåm·ªç m·∫πfa si ni Ladi bi fun - Abba, Atiku, Zainab, Ummi-Hauwa, Maryam ati Rukaiyatu.

·ªåj·ªç ik·∫π·∫πd·ªçgb·ªçn o·π£u kejila ·ªçdun 1967 ni w·ªçn bi Oluwaseyi Abiodun Makinde si idile oloogbe Pa Olatunbosun Makinde ati iyaafin Abigael Makinde ni agbo ile Aigb·ªçfa Oja'aba, ilu Ibadan.
Seyi Makinde b·∫πr·∫π ile iwe alak·ªçb·∫πr·∫π ni St. Paul Primary School, ko to re si ile iwe alak·ªçb·∫πr·∫π St. Michael Yemetu, mejeeji ni ilu Ibadan.
Ile iwe Girama ti Bishop Phillips Academy ni Monatan, Ibadan lo l·ªç.
Ni ·ªçdun 1985, o w·ªç ile iwe giga fasiti ilu Eko, nibi to ti gba oye Bachelor's degree ninu im·ªç ·∫πr·ªç, Electrical Engineering.
Makinde ·π£e agunbanir·ªç ni ile i·π£·∫π epo Shell l·ªçdun 1990, lati ib·∫π lo ti b·∫πr·∫π i·π£·∫π nipa biboju to oniruuru ·∫πka ile i·π£·∫π epo naa.

Aar·∫π Buhari ni adinku ti de ba ·ªçw·ªçja wahala aw·ªçn ik·ªç agbeb·ªçn Boko Haram naa, lati igba ti oun ti de ori oye ni ·ªçdun 2015.

·π¢aaju idibo oril·∫πede Naijiria ni ·ªçj·ªç K·∫πrindinlogun lo·π£u Keji, ik·ªç ay·∫πwo oluwadi fun ilees·∫π BBC, (BBC reality Check) gbe aw·ªçn ohun taw·ªçn eeyan n s·ªç lori bi eto abo ·π£e ri loril·∫πede Naijiria.
Ni ·ªçdun 2002 ni w·ªçn da ·∫πgb·∫π Boko Haram sil·∫π, g·∫πg·∫π bii ·∫πgb·∫π ti kii se oniwahala p·∫πlu afojusun ati ·π£e af·ªçm·ªç ilana ·∫πsin Islam l·∫πkun ariwa oril·∫πede Naijiria.
Am·ªç·π£a ·∫πgb·∫π naa yi pada di agbeb·ªçn ninu ilepa aw·ªçn afojusun r·∫π.

Ni ·ªçdun 2015, Boko Haram gba idanim·ªç g·∫πg·∫π bii ·∫πgb·∫π agbesunm·ªçmi to buru jul·ªç lagbaye, g·∫πg·∫π bi aj·ªç to wa fun ·ªçr·ªç aje ati alaafia lagbaye ·π£e s·ªç.

Aar·∫π t·∫πl·∫π, Olu·π£·∫πgun ·ªåbasanj·ªç to n ·π£atil·∫πyin fun oludije ·∫πgb·∫π alatako, Atiku Abubakar, ti bu ·∫πnu at·∫π lu Aar·∫π Buhari lori igbes·∫π gbigbogun ti  Boko Haram.

Am·ªç·π£a, iwadii ti aj·ªç Armed Conflict Location & Event Data Project (ACLED) ·π£e, ay·∫πwo aw·ªçn iroyin to n jade ninu aw·ªçn ilee·π£·∫π iroyin ab·∫πle ataw·ªçn iroyin miran.

""Bi ·ªçr·ªç ·π£e ri bayii buru pup·ªç ni iwoye temi. O si jina si pe w·ªçn ti bori ik·ªç naa."" Ni ·ªçr·ªç Alex Thurston to j·∫π aj·ªçgb·ªçn ims nipa o·π£elu ati ·ªçr·ªç ·∫πsin ni fasiti Miami ni Ohio.

Ile ·∫πj·ªç naa ni ·∫πj·ªç kot·∫πmil·ªçrun ti oludije ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu PDP, ·ªåj·ªçgb·ªçn Olu·π£·ªçla ·∫∏l·∫πka gbe wa si iwaju r·∫π ko munadoko to.

Aw·ªçn ibudo ologun law·ªçn ilu bii, Metele (November 18), Kekeno (September 23), Mainok, Gajiram, Gashigar (September 25), Damsak (September 12), Zari (August 30), Garunda (August 8) ni aw·ªçn agbeb·ªçn yii ti k·ªçlu.

Ninu l·∫πta kan ti o k·ªç ·π£·ªçw·ªç si aar·∫π Buhari, aj·ªç naa ni, ""·∫πgb·∫πl·∫πgb·∫π bili·ªçnu naira ni a ti ya s·ªçt·ªç fun ilee·π£·∫π ologun lati daabo bo oril·∫πede yii ·π£ugbsn ko j·ªç bi ·∫πni pe eyi ti ni ipa kankan ninu ipa aw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªçogun Naijiria lati dojuk·ªç aw·ªçn agbeb·ªçn BokoHaram ataw·ªçn iks agbeb·ªçn miran loril·∫πede Naijiria.""
Aj·ªç naa woye pe bi ·ªçrs ·π£e ri bayii, ti aw·ªçn ologun ko lee waw·ªç kilanko aw·ªçn agbeb·ªçn naa b·ªçl·∫π, o fihan pe ejo l·ªçw·ªç ninu p·∫πlu bi w·ªçn ·π£e n ·π£e aw·ªçn owo ti w·ªçn ya s·ªçt·ªç lab·∫π i·π£una oril·∫πede Naijiria fun ·∫πka aabo.
L·∫πyin nnkan bi ·ªçj·ªç maarun ti iroyin pe ik·ªç Boko Haram ·π£e iku pa aw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªç ogun Naijiria,Aar·∫π Muahmmadu Buihari ti ba aw·ªçn ·ªçm·ªç Naijiria k·∫πdun lori i·π£·∫πl·∫π naa.

·ªåj·ªçgb·ªçn Adebanji Stephen Akintoye lo jawe olubori ninu idibo ti w·ªçn ·π£e fi yan olori tuntun fun iran Yoruba.

Ninu idibo naa ni Akintoye ti jawe olubori to si di olori Yoruba·∫∏gb·∫πÃÅ Il·∫πÃÄ Yorub√† gba A·π£√≠w√°j√∫ tuntun!
Akintoye lo r·ªçpo oloogbe Abraham Adesanya to n dari iran Yoruba to doloogbe lo·π£u k·∫πrin, l·ªçdun 2008.
A bi Adebanji Akintoye sile alade l·ªçdun 1935.
O j·∫π onk·ªçwe, onim·ªç ninu itan ati alakada.
Adebanji Stephen Akintoye l·ªç sile iwe Emmanuel Primary school Ado Ekiti, ati Christ's School ni Ado Ekiti laarin ·ªçdun 1951 si 1955.
O ka nipa itan ·∫πda ni University College (Overseas College of the University of London) ni Ibadan to ti wa di fasiti ·ªçl·ªçgba ·∫πranko ti sanm·ªçnti gbe dun il·∫π l·ªçdun 1956 si 1961.
·ªåj·ªçgb·ªçn Adebanji gba oye ·ªçm·ªçwe (Ph.D) lori im·ªç kikun ninu itan l·ªçdun 1966 ni Fasiti Ibadan.
O ·π£i·π£·∫π oluk·ªçni ni Fasiti ol√≥d√≤d√≥ If·∫π, to ti di Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile If·∫π nibi to ti gba oye ·ªçj·ªçgb·ªçn to tun ti ·π£e adari ·∫πka ·∫πk·ªç nipa il·∫π Adulaw·ªç  (Institute of African Studies) lati ·ªçdun 1974 si 1977.
O ·π£i·π£·∫π oluk·ªçni nipa Itan eniyan il·∫π Adulaw·ªç ni Fasiti guusu Florida iy·∫πn South Florida University ni Tampa ni Florida ni oril·∫π-ede America.
L·∫πyin eyi o tun ·π£i·π£·∫π oluk·ªçni ni Montgomery County Community College PA ati ni Eastern University St Davids ni Pennsylvania ni America.

Umaru Musa Yar'adua
Umaru Musa Yar'adua ni aar·∫π ik·∫πtala to j·∫π loril·∫πede Naijiria.

·ªåm·ªç ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) nii ·π£e. W·ªçn kede r·∫π g·∫πÃÅg·∫πÃÅ bi ajawe olubori fun ipo aar·∫π l·ªçj k·ªçkanlelogun o·π£u k·∫πrin ·ªçdun 2007 ti w·ªçn si bura w·ªçle fun un ni  ·ªçj·ªç k·ªçkandinl·ªçgb·ªçn o·π£u karun dun kan naa.

Over 50 vultures die after eating meat in Enugu . . Over 50 vultures have died after allegedly feasting on carcasses at an abattoir in Eke-Ihe Market, Enugu state. . . According to the state police spokesman, Ebere Amaraizu, the incident was the handiwork of poachers who usually mix some concoction with slaughtered animal leftovers, with a view to attracting vultures¬†to it and to consume it. . . ‚ÄúFurther information gathered revealed that after consuming the leftovers, vultures would be weak and subsequently die for the poachers to go and pick them up,‚Äù he added.

W·ªçn bi Abdelaziz Bouteflika ni Morocco ni ·ªçj·ªç keji o·π£u k·∫πta ·ªçdun 1937; ara oril·∫πede Algeria law·ªçn obi r·∫π.
·ªåp·ªçl·ªçp·ªç igbe aye r·∫π lo gbe ni Algeria ti o si dara p·ªç m·ªç ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu National Liberation Front (FLN) nigba to wa ni ·ªçd·ªç langba.

·π¢ugb·ªçn nigba to maa fi di ·ªçdun 1965, ·∫πgb·∫π o·π£elu FLN ti wa ninu idamu. gba gba lo yiy·ªç Ben Bella loye ti w·ªçn fi Houari Boumedienne sib·∫π.

·ªåp·ªçl·ªçp·ªç ri i g·∫πg·∫π bi adari to lee yanju aaw·ªç aw·ªçn araalu eyi to b·∫π sil·∫π l·∫πyin ti awn ologun da si i lati dena ki ·∫πgb·∫π ·∫πl·∫πsin Islam kan bori ninu idibo gbogbo gbo ti ·ªçdun 1992.
